text: Bud, Not Buddy is a children's novel written by Christopher Paul Curtis. It is set in Michigan in 1936. It was published in 1999. The book won the Newbery Medal in 2000, for excellence in American children's literature. == References == Category:1999 books Category:20th-century American novels Category:American children's books Category:Fiction set in the past Category:Michigan in fiction Category:Newbery Medal winning books
title: Bud, Not Buddy
